column4: hi, I have bought an IPOD 80gb new classic and I'm trying to load music and pictures on it but it doesn't recognise the files which I'm loading. I'm using Amarok to do so. Someone told me that this could be a problem with itunes.db. any ideas?

hi, I have bought an IPOD 80gb new classic and I'm trying to load music and pictures on it but it doesn't recognise the files which I'm loading. I'm using Amarok to do so. Someone told me that this could be a problem with itunes.db. any ideas?
you will not be able to do it currently
the released version of libgpod ( what amarok uses to transfer files) does not have support for it
